tasks.name: Google Search Console Setup and Property Verification
tasks.description: Set up Google Search Console account and verify ownership of the MemoSpark domain (https://www.memospark.live/) to enable search performance monitoring and indexing control. This is the foundational step that unlocks all other Google search optimization capabilities.
tasks.notes: Domain verification is preferred as it covers all subdomains and protocols automatically. Keep verification credentials secure. If verification fails, try alternative methods.

relatedFiles.description: Directory for HTML verification file upload if needed
Root layout for HTML meta tag verification if needed

tasks.implementationGuide:
1. Create Google Account (if needed):
   - Go to accounts.google.com
   - Use business email (support@memospark.live) for professional setup

2. Access Google Search Console:
   - Navigate to search.google.com/search-console
   - Click 'Start now' and sign in

3. Add Property:
   - Click '+ Add property'
   - Choose 'Domain' property for comprehensive coverage: memospark.live
   - OR choose 'URL prefix' for specific protocol: https://www.memospark.live/
   - Recommendation: Use Domain property for broader coverage

4. Verify Ownership (choose one method):
   - DNS Record (Recommended): Add TXT record to domain DNS
   - HTML File Upload: Upload verification file to public/ directory
   - HTML Tag: Add meta tag to site header
   - Google Analytics: Use existing GA4 property (if available)

5. Complete Verification:
   - Follow verification steps exactly as provided
   - Wait 24-48 hours for verification to complete
   - Confirm green checkmark appears in Search Console
tasks.verificationCriteria: Google Search Console property successfully created and verified with green checkmark. Access to Search Console dashboard with property data. Ability to submit sitemaps and request indexing. Verification method documented for future reference.
tasks.analysisResult: Create a comprehensive manual action plan for getting MemoSpark (https://www.memospark.live/) to appear in Google search results. The plan leverages existing sophisticated SEO infrastructure including advanced sitemap configuration, comprehensive structured data, AI-optimized meta tags, and privacy-compliant design. This actionable plan provides step-by-step instructions based on 2024 best practices for Google indexing, Search Console setup, performance monitoring, and business profile optimization.
tasks.summary: Successfully set up Google Search Console with memospark.live domain property verified and active. Domain property chosen provides comprehensive coverage for all subdomains and protocols. Console dashboard accessible with data processing initiated.
